TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PrintStreamProperty extends System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintProperty

Docs.summary: Represents a <xref:System.IO.Stream> property (and its value) of a printing system hardware or software component.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string attributeName) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> property that the represents.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular <xref:System.IO.Stream> property of a print system object, including casing. For example, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemJobInfo.JobStream%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemJobInfo> object must be spelled "JobStream", not "Stream" or "Jobstream".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string attributeName, object attributeValue) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> property that the represents.
The value of the property that the represents.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that has the specified value for the specified property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular <xref:System.IO.Stream> property of a print system object, including casing. For example, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemJobInfo.JobStream%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemJobInfo> object must be spelled "JobStream", not "Stream" or "Jobstream".
